name: ExperiMental (itch) (FruityFusion)
description:
Your job is to test a new research chemical that leads to side-effects every 10 seconds. Find your way through the levels and fight other test subjects. Benefit from buffs, stomach the negative side-effects, and know that everything can change within 10 seconds!

Credits

OrangeJam - Design, Programming

nilolo - Design, Programming

ritz1231 - Design, Programming, Music

Ni3lz - 3D Art

We used several third-party assets for icons and textures. See Credits on Github for details. The game is open-source!

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 51! The theme was "Every 10 Seconds".
